sentences.en: ...the hustle and bustle of modern life.
A slight bustle in the court recalled him to himself.
sentences.cn: 法庭上掀起的一阵小小的骚动使他从出神的状态中恢复过来.

sentences.en: Come, bustle up, and I'll get your things together.
sentences.cn: 快点动手吧, 我来给你收拾东西.

sentences.en: Fun, bustle, colour and clamour everywhere.
sentences.cn: 到处好玩, 到处热闹, 到处有声有色.

sentences.en: I hate all the hustle ( and bustle ) of Saturday shopping.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌星期六买东西那 麽 挤来挤去的.

sentences.en: I lay for some time, watching the bustle which succeeded the attack.
sentences.cn: 我在地上趴了一会儿, 注视着炮轰结束后海盗们忙碌的样子.

sentences.en: I sat in a caf é, watching the bustle of the street outside.
sentences.cn: 我坐在咖啡馆里, 望着街上忙碌的景象.

sentences.en: If a poet is divorced from the hustle and bustle of life, he can't write inspiring poetry.
sentences.cn: 若是离开了沸腾的生活, 诗人是写不出感人的诗篇的.

sentences.en: It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.
sentences.cn: 看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。

sentences.en: My mother bustled around the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我母亲在厨房里忙得团团转。

sentences.en: Presently we heard a bustle, and a tread of feet.
sentences.cn: 不久我们听到一阵喧噪声, 和脚步声.

sentences.en: She smiled and talked and kept the bustle going.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上一直挂着笑容,谈个不停,尽量让忙乱的气氛延续下去.

sentences.en: She stood glued to the radio, heedless of the ordered bustle about her.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里一动不动地听收音机, 毫不注意周围有秩序的忙碌.

sentences.en: She was sure the bustle about her would be less.
sentences.cn: 她肯定关于她的风言风语会减少的.

sentences.en: The bustle and din gradually faded to silence as night advanced.
sentences.cn: 随着夜越来越深,喧闹声逐渐沉寂.

sentences.en: There was a good deal of cheerful bustle.
This place is very quiet, quite different from the hustle and bustle of the cities.
sentences.cn: 这个地方很安静, 与城市的拥挤喧嚣十分不同.

words.tran_cn: 忙碌的；热闹的；正被占用的
喧闹；活跃；裙撑；热闹的活动

trans.tran_cn: 喧闹，（女裙后部的）腰垫，裙撑，热闹的活动，奔走，忙乱

trans.tran_en: to move around quickly, looking very busy
to move around quickly, looking very busy
